name: Listened to Cristobal’s Potential Coordinators, Staff, And 2023 Recruiting

content.html:
Alex Donno and Larry Blustein are back, wishing everyone a Happy New Year! The guys discuss Miami’s withdrawal from the Tony The Tiger Sun Bowl due to Covid-19. Looking ahead, the guys predict who the next offensive coordinator might be and how the offensive formations may change. Plus, wide receivers coach Greg Likens has departed for SMU, but we already know his likely replacement. Blu explains when Miami’s recruiting efforts will pick up again.

By 5 Rings: A Canes Thing
